00006 std::string nodeTypeToString( NodeType nodeType )
00007 {
00008         std::string returnString;
00009 
00010         switch( nodeType )
00011         {
00012         case GroupNodeType:
00013                 returnString = "GroupNode";
00014                 break;
00015         case SolidSphereNodeType:
00016                 returnString = "SolidSphereNode";
00017                 break;
00018         case TranslationNodeType:
00019                 returnString = "TranslationNode";
00020                 break;
00021         case TextureNodeType:
00022                 returnString = "TextureNode";
00023                 break;
00024         case RotationAnimationNodeType:
00025                 returnString = "RotationAnimationNode";
00026                 break;
00027         default:
00028                 returnString = "UnknownNode";   
00029         }
00030         return returnString;
00031 }

00095 std::string SceneGraphNode::toString(void) const
00096 {
00097         std::string s = "Node{";
00098         s += name_;
00099         s += ",";
00100         s += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(id_);
00101         s += ",";
00102         s += nodeTypeToString( nodeType_ );
00103         s += "}";
00104         return s;
